Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; two added red bands below rim; lotus flower in added white outline with red centre above two more red bands; top of rim glazed; exterior; band of single dots between dilute lines; below, reserved.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 301, no. 1086)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1110) (phase 2)
